title: Directors of the EBRD
snippet: Prior to working at the EBRD, Mr Patrone was Managing Director of the private equity arm of Finanziaria Internazionale, an Italian merchant bank, where he spent 10 years investing in a broad range of sectors.

title: EBRD Board of Directors
snippet: While retaining overall authority over the Bank, the Board of Governors delegates most powers to the Board of Directors, which is responsible for approving the EBRD's country, sector and thematic strategies, policies and operations.

title: 2020 election of the EBRD President
snippet: The EBRD's Board of Governors elected Odile Renaud-Basso as President to succeed Sir Suma Chakrabarti in October 2020.

title: EBRD President Odile Renaud-Basso
snippet: The EBRD’s Board of Governors re-elected Ms Renaud-Basso for a second term as President at its 33rd Annual Meeting held in Yerevan, Armenia.

title: Matteo Patrone
snippet: He has overall responsibility for the effective delivery of EBRD investments and advisory activities in the Bank’s countries of operation, in addition to contributing to the delivery of EBRD policy engagement activities.
